Section.Catchline: Assessments against member HMOs; income tax credit for assessments paid.

SectionBody.Text: Any provisions of the law to the contrary notwithstanding, a member HMO may offset against its corporate income tax liability or other liabilities, on an individual or consolidated basis, as applicable, any assessment described in s. 631.819 to the extent of 20 percent of the amount of such assessment for each of the 5 calendar years following the year in which such assessment was paid.
